variable.name: m_yaw
variable.description: This variable controls how fast the player turns left and right when the mouse is moved left and right. It is recommended that this variable be left alone and instead the "sensitivity" variable is used to change the level of precision. If you set this variable to a negative value you will reverse the mouse movement. Some script writers use this variable to increase the level of precision when the "fov" variable is used to zoom the screen.
